00145     bool Vector3::operator== (const Vector3 &Vec2)
00146     {
00147         if ( Vec2.X == this->X && Vec2.Y == this->Y && Vec2.Z == this->Z )
00148             { return true; }
00149         return false;
00150     }

00155             { return true; }
00156         return false;

00283     ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00284     // Fancy Math
00285 
00286     Vector3 Vector3::CrossProduct( const Vector3& rkVector ) const
00287     {
00288         return Vector3(
00289                 this->Y * rkVector.Z - this->Z * rkVector.Y,
00290                 this->Z * rkVector.X - this->X * rkVector.Z,
00291                 this->X * rkVector.Y - this->Y * rkVector.X
00292             );
00293     }
00294 
00295     Real Vector3::dotProduct(const Vector3& vec) const
00296     {
00297         return this->X * vec.X + this->Y * vec.Y + this->Z * vec.Z;
00298     }
00299 
00300     void Vector3::Normalize()
00301     {
00302         Real TempLength = this->Distance(Vector3(0.0f,0.0f,0.0f));
00303         if (0!=TempLength)
00304         {
00305              (*this) /= TempLength;
00306         }else{
00307             /// @todo discuss the merits throwing an error here.
00308         }
00309     }
00310 
00311     Vector3 Vector3::GetNormal() const
00312     {
00313         Real TempLength = this->Distance(Vector3(0.0f,0.0f,0.0f));
00314         if (0!=TempLength)
00315         {
00316             return (*this) / TempLength;
00317         }else{
00318             /// @todo discuss the merits throwing an error here.
00319             return (*this);
00320         }
00321     }
00322 
00323     Vector3 Vector3::GetDirection(const Vector3& Destination) const
00324     {
00325         Vector3 Dir = Destination - *this;
00326         Dir.Normalize();
00327         return Dir;
00328     }
00329 
00330     void Vector3::Inverse()
00331     {
00332         X=1/X;
00333         Y=1/Y;
00334         Z=1/Z;
00335     }

00337     ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00338     // Manual Conversions
00339     btVector3 Vector3::GetBulletVector3() const
00340     {
00341         btVector3 Theirs;
00342         Theirs.setX(this->X);
00343         Theirs.setY(this->Y);
00344         Theirs.setZ(this->Z);
00345         Theirs.setW(0);
00346         return Theirs;
00347     }

00350     {
00351         this->X=Ours.getX();
00352         this->Y=Ours.getY();
00353         this->Z=Ours.getZ();
00354     }

00385         this->Z=Ours.z;
00386     }
00387 
00388     Real Vector3::Distance(const Vector3 &OtherVec) const
00389     {
00390         float Xdelta = Ogre::Math::Abs(this->X - OtherVec.X);
00391         float Ydelta = Ogre::Math::Abs(this->Y - OtherVec.Y);
00392         float Zdelta = Ogre::Math::Abs(this->Z - OtherVec.Z);
00393         return Ogre::Math::Sqrt( Xdelta*Xdelta + Ydelta*Ydelta + Zdelta*Zdelta );
00394     }
00395

00436 
00437 #ifdef PHYSXML
00438 std::istream& PHYS_LIB operator >> (std::istream& stream, phys::Vector3& Vec)
00439 {
00440     phys::String OneTag( phys::xml::GetOneTag(stream) );
00441     std::auto_ptr<phys::xml::Document> Doc( phys::xml::PreParseClassFromSingleTag("phys::", "Vector3", OneTag) );
00442 
00443     Doc->GetFirstChild() >> Vec;
00444 
00445     return stream;
00446 }
00447 
00448 phys::xml::Node& operator >> (const phys::xml::Node& OneNode, phys::Vector3& Vec)
00449 {
00450     if(OneNode.GetAttribute("Version").AsInt() == 1)
00451     {
00452         Vec.X=OneNode.GetAttribute("X").AsReal();
00453         Vec.Y=OneNode.GetAttribute("Y").AsReal();
00454         Vec.Z=OneNode.GetAttribute("Z").AsReal();
00455     }else{
00456         throw( phys::Exception("Incompatible XML Version for Vector3: Not Version 1"));
00457     }
00458 }
00459 #endif // \PHYSXML
